attributes.description:
Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock.
A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further.
Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!

attributes.description:
Comfort, luxury is this 2016 Jaguar XF 20d R-Sport, this beautiful and powerful vehicle is as comfortable as it is spacious. This vehicle has more than enough room for the whole family and more than enough power to make the drive easy. Vehicle comes with power steering, multi-functioning steering, electric windows, central locking remote, electric mirrors, leather seats, reverse camera, navigation system, radio/Bluetooth connectivity, paddle shifting and panoramic roof. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
#10280
